definitions.text: the event of dying or departure from life
examples: her death came as a terrible shock
upon your decease the capital will pass to your grandchildren

definitions.text: the permanent end of all life functions in an organism or part of an organism
examples: the animal died a painful death

definitions.text: the absence of life or state of being dead
examples: he seemed more content in death than he had ever been in life
it was the death of all his plans

definitions.text: the time at which life ends; continuing until dead

examples: Death walked the streets of the plague-bound city
he came to a bad end
the so-called glorious experiment came to an inglorious end
he had two deaths on his conscience
